content:
The Ultimate Chocolate Chip Cookie

Ingredients:
1. ¾ cup Butter Flavor Crisco
2. 1 ¼ cups firmly packed light brown sugar
3. 2 Tbsp. Milk
4. 1 Tbsp. Vanilla
5. 1 egg
6. 1 ¾ cups all-purpose flour
7. 1 tsp. salt
8. ¾ tsp. baking soda
9. 1 cup semi-sweet chocolate chips
10. 1 cup pecan pieces (optional)

Instructions:
1. Heat oven to 375°F.
2. Combine Butter Flavor Crisco, brown sugar, milk, and vanilla in a large bowl. Beat at medium speed of electric mixer until creamy.
3. Beat egg into creamed mixture until just blended.
4. Combine flour, salt, and baking soda and mix into creamed mixture.
5. Stir in chocolate chips and pecan pieces.
6. Drop rounded tablespoonfuls (about 2 measuring tablespoons of dough) 3 inches apart on ungreased baking sheet.
7. Bake at 375°F for 8 to 10 minutes for chewy cookies (cookies will appear moist—do not overbake), or 11 to 13 minutes for crisp cookies. 
8. Cool on baking sheet 2 minutes. Remove to cooling rack. Makes 3 dozen 3-inch cookies.
